name: Dash Puzzle no Control
description:
Made in 10 hours - Tuto in description

Controls

[W] [A] [S] [D]

Move around

Game

Reach the green tile to go to the next level. Your moves in every directions (A, D, S, W) will changes every level. You will be told how many tiles you move in every direction by the pink/purples numbers on the side of the screen. To retry a level, press [R]. To start over, press the [Esc] key.

Tiles
Green tile: Goal
Red tiles: Damage Tiles
Blues tiles: Ice. You will slide on them if you end a move on it.
Yellow Tiles: When on them, your next move will only move you 1 square (in any direction, regardless of your moves)

Average gameplay time: 2 minutes (as long as it will have taken you to read the tuto)

Good Luck, Have Fun !
